workspace.name: SenpaiJepang MVP API Delivery
workspace.description:
Trust-first MVP execution board (API-first).
Policy: Quality > Quantity.

cards.name: [M0] Connect planning docs to ClickUp traceability
cards.desc: Anchor all active planning docs into ClickUp execution. Sources: docs/architecture/MVP-API-BREAKDOWN-v1.md, docs/architecture/MVP-API-NON-TECH-GUIDE-v1.md, docs/architecture/API-PLAN-FIGMA-v1.md, docs/architecture/API-PLAN-STITCH-SCREENS-v1.md.
checklist: Confirm all plan docs exist in docs/architecture
Map each plan section to at least one execution task
Mark deprecated docs as archived references only

cards.name: [M0] Stabilize API runtime baseline
cards.desc: Lock local infra + API orchestration baseline.
checklist: Keep apps/api as single active app workspace
Verify dev:all and check:dev-all for API-only mode

cards.name: [M1] Auth lifecycle hardening
checklist: Token expiry and refresh rotation assertions
Negative test coverage for auth errors

cards.name: [M2] KYC intake end-to-end
cards.desc: Ship KYC session -> upload-url -> documents -> submit flow.

cards.name: [M2] Jobs discovery API from stitch screens
cards.desc: Build jobs listing and detail API for browse_jobs_listing + job_detail_view.
checklist: Return viewerState for guest/auth CTA behavior

cards.name: [M2] Saved jobs state sync
cards.desc: Support bookmark toggle consistency between listing and detail.

cards.name: [M3] Review queue and decision API
cards.desc: Complete review queue and moderation decision endpoints.

cards.name: [M3] Provider webhook idempotency hardening
cards.desc: Strengthen provider metadata + webhook replay safety.

cards.name: [M3] Job apply + journey tracker API
cards.desc: Implement apply flow and application journey timeline API for application_journey_tracker screen.
checklist: Timeline states reflect backend status transitions

cards.name: [M3] Feed and saved-posts API
cards.desc: Implement senpai_jepang_feed endpoints and save behavior.

cards.name: [M4] Profile completion + verification checklist API
cards.desc: Serve user_profile_kyc screen from API without hardcoded data.
checklist: Wire document statuses from KYC lifecycle

cards.name: [M4] Final verification request flow
cards.desc: Support CTA Request Final Verification in profile screen.
checklist: Audit log entry for final verification request

cards.name: [M4] Contract sync and API documentation gates
cards.desc: Ensure runtime contracts and implementation docs stay synchronized for all new endpoints.
checklist: Update openapi-runtime-v0.yaml for every new endpoint
Link completed API tasks back to API-PLAN-STITCH-SCREENS-v1.md

cards.name: [M4] API release candidate gates
cards.desc: Freeze contract and pass all quality checks for API MVP RC.
